comment: Very good professor

Dr. Curry is an amazing professor. His classes may be a little boring, but he truly cares for his students. He is easy to access and offers in person or an online meeting for each class. He helps with assignments and all his information is structured clearly and concisely. I would highly recommend Dr. Curry he is an amazing professor and person!
Took this class online. 3 short recorded lectures to watch per week, low workload, and only 3 essays. Professor is very knowledgeable and kind. Take him!

Worst proffesor!! The instructions provided for assignments and projects were ambiguous, leading to confusion among students. There was minimal engagement and interaction during lectures. Constructive feedback on assignments was lacking, making it challenging to understand areas for improvement. also he used another platform (Flipgrid) hard to use

Dr. Curry is a great professor. I took him for my summer semester and he is a very kind and generous teacher. As long as you follow along with his lectures and submit your assignments on time you should be able to get an A. His assignments are reasonable and he gives great feedback. He's always available if students need help.

He has a LOT of energy, I tend to enjoy the calmness so maybe that's behind my rating. He's specific when he grades, read your feedback and the textbook is helpful however a physical copy was not necessary. He will answer your questions via email or in person. Peer feedback can be helpful.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr.Curry is good he is understanding and encouraging. He is encouraging as well. There are 3 papers to write they are very simple and easy. You get class feedback and his. You can go to class in person or online but you just have to participate here and there so he doest take participation points. Over all not a bad class I recommend.

Dr. Curry is very uplifting and has an energy that makes you enjoy his class. His feedback on essays is very helpful and always gives clear instructions. He is very quick to grade assignments and also responds to any emails I have sent. Overall a great professor that I highly recommend someone to take.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: This Professor seems to care a lot about his students, however the lectures consist of him reading word for word off of his power point slides. It feels like a 50 minute long high school presentation. If you show up to class and complete the assignments you should be fine.

Really great personality and cares a lot about teaching. Relatively easy assignments/essays but can be a little tough with grading when it comes to small details like grammar. He understood how student life was and did his best to accommodate for our needs. I would take him again if I could!!
Good teacher, not as easy as ENGL 1101. Do all the assignments and you should be fine.

I really enjoyed Dr Curry's class. You grade is pretty much entirely based on the 3 Essays you write and there is a few other smaller grades such as flip grid assignments where you just record a video saying you watched his flip grid and you get a 100. He gives good feedback on papers and seems to respect his students.
rating_tags: So many papers--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Great guy. Assignments are easy and spelled out to you. He gives great feedback on the drafts before the final papers. Easy completion grades throughout the course. Easy material, passionate professor, and overall a great course.
He is a super funny and chill guy. He gives you lots of time to work on your assignments and gives grace periods for major essays.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: W Professor (no quizzes/tests only 3 major essays ;)

Dr. Curry was decent. He used "turnitin" to check plagiarism on the assignments and it's not all the way accurate, and he will often just take what it says and run with it without reviewing. However, he does give very easy extra credit assignments that will boost your grade.

I honestly loved having Dr.Curry as a professor. He is an easy class to pass if you put in the work and don't BS essays! Honestly, he is quite easy in terms of grading. I'd mess up on punctuation and still get A's/high B's on my major essays. Easy class to pass if you put in the effort. Class work is a breeze.

have always been an all A student when it comes to writing and he is the hardest grader I have had. not even hard but unfair. takes off 20 points for the most minor mistakes. would never take again. good luck passing
Thought he was amazing the first week and now I think otherwise

Dr Curry is a great professor, very helpful, organized, and understanding, but his lectures mainly consist of him just reading from the textbook/websites. I'd not take him again simply because I am not a fan of his way of teaching. He's very clear about his grading criteria since day one and he enters grades very quickly on d2l.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: He's a cool guy, fairly funny. The class was really easy and every week he does a flipgrid where you respond with "Thanks for the video Dr.Curry" and get a 100% for homework that week. He breaks down the papers, but can be a bit nit picky with his grading, but not too tough a grader. He's easy to reach outside of class, zooms on Fridays.

Dr. Curry was the most amazing professor I've taken at KSU. This class was so fun, and made me actually want to come to school on Mondays which is a feat. Dr. Curry created an environment where we all felt safe to share our poetry, no matter how personal it was. We're also trying to convince him to come play Dungeons and Dragons with us :)
The Michael Jordan of professors

Pretty good professor. Not sure what the point is of some of the things he does in class and he uses links and powerpoints to teach everything. He says you need a book but he just puts what you need to see on the screen so you really don't need it.
Hes an amazing teacher and super nice .. he will definitely make sure youre good

He was a cool Prof. He just reads from the textbook for EVERY class. Only go to class when he is presenting a new essay, other than that you don't have to go to class at all. Only 3 essays the whole semester plus weekly flip grid vids. Cool guy, chill class, easy A

If youre looking for a challenging class or professor this isnt for you. He isnt a terrible professor he just isnt the greatest with Original content he reads straight from the book then reads from websites. Youll get easy A assignments like Flipgrids weekly. Harsh grader on papers but gives great detail on whats wrong,

Dr. Curry is such a nice guy! Going to his class was kind of pointless though. All we did was read the textbook and some websites out loud. He has weekly flipgrid videos that you have to respond to- don't skip those! There were also 3 papers that weren't too bad. The feedback he gives on the rough drafts don't help a ton, but he's an easy grader

Professor Curry has a great personality very funny but the class is kinda boring. It mostly consists of reading straight from the book and for me I cant focus that way. You can technically get away with not showing up and still be on top of everything. Grades mostly consist of weekly videos and majority essays.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Tough grader

comment: get ready to write essays. often didn't teach as much as read a website or tell us to popcorn read from the book. will call you out if you don't participate. pretty tough grader on essays. lots of reading.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Dr. Curry always made the class as exciting as he could. We did the same thing every single day, read from the textbook and read from the board. Pretty boring class if you ask me but it was an easy A. There are only 3 essays and flipgrid videos are due every week. Definitely take Dr. Curry if you can!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things--Lecture heavy

comment: Great Guy! Not a bad prof. But, to be completely honest his class is useless. It consists of him literally reading the textbook word for word. He does weekly easy A assignments, and papers are done in sectors which is nice. Outside of actual class time the class is just writing papers. If you do the assignments you should have a fairly easy time.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: Overall, he is a good professor. Class consisted of a lot of reading, and many drafts and outlines for papers. Will NOT round your grade so do well and take any extra credit available.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Dr. Curry is a cool person, but a mediocre teacher. Your grade is solely based on your ability to write a paper well (not surprising) meaning you can get away with an easy A as long as you know what youre talking about. However, his communication is poor and his classes are literally only him reading straight from the textbook.

Dr. Curry was an easy professor to take in the time of COVID-19. The entire class session is him reading from a textbook (verbatim) of stuff that was covered in high school. I didn't learn much, except for how to write a paper 2 hours before it was due. Very passive aggressive in communicating with students. Recommend if you know enough to fake it.

Professor Curry is a great professor. I feel bad that he chose to teach English though because personally, I can't stand the subject. The class is super easy. You could miss every day and still pass. Just make sure you look at the examples he leaves and you'll be good to go. He's a bit passive-aggressive though and might not answer your emails.
rating_tags: Inspirational--Graded by few things--So many papers

comment: I took professor Curry once for ENG 1101 and again for ENG 1102 it was the best decision I even made. Dr. Curry really loves what he does and hes really passionate, he cares about his students and wants you to pass. Definitely would take him again if I could. Hes funny and gives great feedback for essays making them easy go write. Great class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Amazing lectures

comment: Dr. Mack Curry was AMAZING! He gave clear instructions, extended deadlines, and was very lenient with his grading. Dr. Curry also was clear on the effect of COVID-19 and took that into consideration with each of his students, in addition to making sure our workload was just the right amount and given at a good pace! I would highly recommend him
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Taken during covid but he held online class during the expected time. I only used the textbook during class because he read chapter(s) for about half the class. He clearly goes through each assignment, gives examples and is completely available for questions. Super easy to contact and a very chill professor.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Participation matters

comment: Dr. Mack is a very understanding professor. His grading is fair and he gives useful feedback.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class
